job.title: WiFi Software Engineer
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtSummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtJoin our Sensing and Connectivity team and drive innovation that matters We build and seamlessly integrate technologies that enrich peoples lives and deliver the best userexperience ltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtAs part of the WiFi software development team we make decisions that influence the connectivity experience on products people use every single day across the world Are you a software development enthusiast Are you passionate about internetenabled devices and networking protocols Do you want to learn more about WiFi and other wireless technologies If your answer is yes we may have the job for youltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtKey Qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtBABS in Computer Engineering Computer Science or equivalent experienceltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtKnowledge of data structures and their applications ltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtExperience developing software using CC ObjectiveC or JavaltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtStrong competence and experience in Layer 2 Layer 3 networking QoSltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtStrong analytical and problemsolving skillsltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtExcellent analytical programming and debugging skillsltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtThrive in a collaborative environment and can clearly communicate while driving multiple projects across teamsltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtPassionately hardworking and inquisitive and seek to tackle everyday problems in innovative waysltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtDescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtAs WiFi team member youll be responsible for crafting developing and optimizing WiFi networking subsystem software across Apple products including iPhone Mac Apple Watch and Apple TVltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtYou will also be working across software stacks Frameworks and API UI OS services and drivers to maintain and productize features collaboratively with the hardware and software teams within all of AppleltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtYou will be encouraged to own drive and execute the full software development cycle  from the ideation design implementation to testing and measuring the success of the feature you develop We want you to make intelligent compromises between several contradictory factors such as ease of use performance and efficiencyltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtEducation ampamp Experienceltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtBachelors degree in Computer Science or equivalentltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtMasters Degree preferredltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtRole Number 200242162ltbrgtltbrgt
